pageProps.content:
# Chilli Con Carne

Serves 4

## Ingredients

* 1 brown onion
* 1 red capcicum
* 1/2 - 1 cup mixed frozen veg
* 2 Tb minced garlic
* 1 kg beef mince
* 1 can diced tomato
* 1 can kidney beans

## Sauce Ingredients

* 1/2 tsp salt
* 1/2 tsp black pepper
* 1/2 tsp cayenne pepper
* 2 tsp cummin
* 1 Tb BBQ or tomato sauce
* 1 tsp cinnamon
* 2 Tb chicken stock
* 2 Tb beef stock
* 1/2 tsp chilli flakes (optional for spice)
* 2 Tb worstershire sauce
* 1 cup water

## Extras

* 100ml red wine
* pineapple
* serve with rice

## Method

1. Mix sauce and put to side
2. Fry meat, garlic, veg etc
3. Add sauce
4. Simmer 15-20m

## Notes
